description.overview: Growth represents your capacity for personal evolution, stepping into new versions of yourself, and life chapter transitions.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Jupiter and Uranus transits to your natal Jupiter, Uranus, and key houses (5th = creative evolution, 8th = transformational growth, 11th = future self). Jupiter brings expansion and philosophical growth. Uranus creates breakthrough evolution and liberation from old patterns. When these planets form supportive aspects, you grow naturally and feel excited about becoming who you're meant to be. Challenging aspects create growing pains, resistance to change, or overwhelming transformation. Both retrograde reduce growth pressure by 20% while deepening internal evolution.

primary_planets.jupiter: Expansion, philosophical growth, becoming more of who you are
primary_planets.uranus: Breakthrough evolution, liberation from old patterns, quantum leaps

secondary_planets.pluto: Deep transformational growth through death/rebirth cycles

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum growth impact - major life chapter transitions
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between old and new self
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - natural evolution and easy growth
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - growing pains that require work
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for personal development

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Evolutionary and transition-focused - talk about becoming, chapters, transformation
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize leaning into growth, embracing change, stepping into new versions of self
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize integration periods after growth, rest is part of evolution, dormancy isn't stuckness
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Validate growing pains and resistance - growth is uncomfortable but worth it

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Growth is flowing naturally today - lean into becoming the next version of yourself and trust this evolutionary process.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: You're in active transformation but it's uncomfortable - growing pains are real, and resistance is part of the process.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Growth feels blocked or you're resisting change today - honor the integration period after recent evolution before pushing for more.
